skills.desc: Attacks 1 enemy. Heals the ally with the lowest HP by 10% of this Champion’s MAX HP.
skills.name: Ichor of Life
skills.books:
Lvl. 2 Damage +10%
Lvl. 3  Heal +10%
Lvl. 4 Damage +10%
Lvl. 5  Heal +10%

skills.desc: Removes all debuffs from all allies, then places a 50% [Increase ATK] buff and a [Shield] buff equal to 25% of this Champion’s MAX HP on all allies for 2 turns.
skills.name: Oozing Blessing

skills.desc: Revives all dead allies with 50% HP and 50% Turn Meter, then places a [Block Debuffs] buff on all allies for 2 turns. Will place the [Block Debuffs] buff even if there are no dead allies.
skills.name: Plasm Rebirth
skills.books:
Lvl. 2 Cooldown -1Lvl. 2 Buff/Debuff Chance +100%
Lvl. 3 Cooldown -1Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +100%

skills.desc:
[Active Effect]

At the start of each turn, fills the Turn Meters of all allies by 10%.

[Passive Effect]

At the start of each turn, places a 15% [Continuous Heal] buff on the ally with the lowest HP for 2 turns. Will not place the [Continuous Heal] buff on this Champion.
skills.name: Creep [P]
